Items.Title: Today's Income
Items.DataSource:
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(SUBTOTAL),0)/IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,1000000,1000),2), IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,'M','K')) Amount      FROM invoice i        JOIN invoice_item ii ON ii.invoice_id = i.invoice_id 
JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = ii.product_id
        LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.primary_product_category_id      WHERE DATE(invoice_date) BETWEEN {START_DATE} AND {END_DATE}           AND  INVOICE_MAIN_TYPE_ID IN ("SALES_INVOICE","CASH_SALES_INVOICE")
        AND   (I.IS_VOID IS NULL or I.IS_VOID <> 'Y')

Items.Title: This Week Income
Items.DataSource:
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(SUBTOTAL),0)/IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,1000000,1000),2), IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,'M','K')) Amount      FROM invoice i        JOIN invoice_item ii ON ii.invoice_id = i.invoice_id 
JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = ii.product_id
        LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.primary_product_category_id      WHERE DATE(invoice_date) BETWEEN {START_DATE} AND {END_DATE}           AND  INVOICE_MAIN_TYPE_ID IN ("SALES_INVOICE","CASH_SALES_INVOICE")
        AND   (I.IS_VOID IS NULL or I.IS_VOID <> 'Y')

Items.DataSource:
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(SUBTOTAL),0)/IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,1000000,1000),2), IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,'M','K')) Amount      FROM invoice i        JOIN invoice_item ii ON ii.invoice_id = i.invoice_id

Items.Title: This Year Income
Items.DataSource:
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(SUBTOTAL),0)/IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,1000000,1000),2), IF(SUM(SUBTOTAL)>1000000,'M','K')) Amount      FROM invoice i        JOIN invoice_item ii ON ii.invoice_id = i.invoice_id 
JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.product_id = ii.product_id
        LEFT JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.primary_product_category_id      WHERE DATE(invoice_date) BETWEEN {START_DATE} AND {END_DATE}           AND  INVOICE_MAIN_TYPE_ID IN ("SALES_INVOICE","CASH_SALES_INVOICE")
        AND   (I.IS_VOID IS NULL or I.IS_VOID <> 'Y')

Items.Title: Highest Sales by Customer
Items.DataSource:
SELECT CONCAT(FORMAT(IFNULL(SUM(i.`INVOICE_TOTAL`),0)/IF(SUM(i.`INVOICE_TOTAL`)>1000000,1000000,1000),2), IF(SUM(i.`INVOICE_TOTAL`)>1000000,'M','K')) Amount
FROM invoice i
LEFT JOIN party p ON i.`PARTY_ID`= p.`PARTY_ID`
WHERE DATE(invoice_date) BETWEEN {START_DATE} AND {END_DATE} 
AND  INVOICE_MAIN_TYPE_ID IN ("SALES_INVOICE","CASH_SALES_INVOICE")
AND (I.IS_VOID IS NULL OR I.IS_VOID <> 'Y') AND i.`IS_APPROVED`= "Y"

Items.Title: SALES BY CATEGORY(PIE)
Items.DataSource:
SELECT
 `product_category`.`CATEGORY_NAME` AS label,
 Round(SUM(`invoice_item`.`SUBTOTAL`),2) AS DATA,
  'Label' AS datasetLabel
  FROM `invoice_item`
  JOIN invoice ON invoice_item.`INVOICE_ID`= invoice.`INVOICE_ID`
  JOIN product ON invoice_item.`PRODUCT_ID`= product.`PRODUCT_ID`
  JOIN product_category ON product.`PRIMARY_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID`= product_category.`PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID`
  WHERE invoice.INVOICE_MAIN_TYPE_ID IN ("SALES_INVOICE","CASH_SALES_INVOICE") AND (invoice.IS_VOID IS NULL or invoice.IS_VOID <> 'Y')
  AND DATE(invoice.`INVOICE_DATE`) BETWEEN {START_DATE} AND {END_DATE}
  GROUP BY product.`PRIMARY_PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID`

SettingsObj.START_DATE: (SELECT FROM_DATE FROM custom_time_period WHERE DATE(NOW()) BETWEEN from_date AND thru_date AND period_type_id = 'FISCAL_YEAR' LIMIT 0,1)
SettingsObj.END_DATE: (SELECT THRU_DATE FROM custom_time_period WHERE DATE(NOW()) BETWEEN from_date AND thru_date AND period_type_id = 'FISCAL_YEAR' LIMIT 0,1)
